replies.body: Thank you so much for including my PROJECT: Leona in the Cosplay Showcase! <3 {{champion:89}}
Really glad I got to see your Leona in person. =) Keep up the awesome work!

I wasn't there, but I've seen a ton of pictures of your PROJECT: Leona. You're really awesome!

Whenever I see you in one of the videos, I'll just stop it and be like, "that's her!"

EDIT: Your cosplay was so good it even got ~~two~~ three photos on the PAX East 2016 Cosplay photo album!
Aww, thank you so much! You are too kind. :3

Thank you for replying! That makes me so happy!

######You're so awesome :o
AMAGAD STAHPPP. :3 <3 But thanks.

YOU DID IT AGAIN <3

Can I add you?

EDIT: If you don't want to, that's all right.
I love your cosplay so much leona Is my favorite and seeing someone actually cosplay made me so Happy. I legit first saw you and i was determined to get your picture. (Ofc by the end of pax I had)
Leona Is Love Leona Is life. {{champion:89}}

SHREK IS LOVE SHREK IS LIFE

But, yes, Leona > Shrek. ^^
I'm really glad you snagged a photo. :) I felt like a chicken with its head cut off running around the expo. Hehe.
Thank You, Summoner
Yes! I remember you, we talked about getting the plastic cut for your Accessories and how awesome your contacts were! Thanks for the tips on the foam work as well! Keep up the awesome cosplays!
Best Leona Cosplay Eva!!! {{champion:89}}
D'awww, thank you!!! <3
LEONAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
{{champion:131}} So happy to see my Slayer Diana in a few of these :3
That Lee Sin you were with didn't see Slayer Diana though. I would know, I was the Lee Sin.
I think I see it! thats cool! {{champion:131}}
I'm the Twisted Fate in the 4th photo from the top. Life complete.
Awesome! Thank you for taking part in the showcase. ^_^
The Jynx responded to my comment. SQUEEEEEEE
Kohai Vel'koz{{champion:161}} and Senpai Malzahar{{champion:90}} are Princess Gigglesnort and Teragarm Cosplay XD We both made the head! It was super fun to be in the showcase!!
OMG IM DRAVEN

I'm glad to have had the opportunity to be involved with such a classy bunch!
I was the Omega Squad Teemo{{champion:17}}  in the Boogie and /ALLCHAT vids!

I love your cosplay! teemo has always been a favorite of mine. I'm trying my first cosplay this year and I am also going as omega squad teemo. Do you have any sites that link to your work, I'd love to follow!!

I really like your cosplay! It looks really epic!

You also got a few photos in the Imgur album!

So your eyes change color? :o
I was one of the Jinxes in the video! YEEEEEE. So many good cosplays. I miss PAX East already.
Woo! I was the genderbend Arcade Riven :D
I was the Goth Annie standing next to the Garen in line for the Showcase XD https://www.facebook.com/fallenfaerycosplay/
Looks really great!
Thank you! :D
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Oh man that free shrugs guy. Amazing that one. Glad he made the album over other cosplays.
All cosplayers who took photos outside of the Cospitality Room appear in the album. =)
Well there's more than were in there the first time I looked. I guess you're not done posting all of them?

Hmmm, I uploaded 11 new images today, but there should have been over 400 in the Cospitality gallery yesterday morning. I'm sorry you had trouble seeing all the pictures though. Hopefully you can see them all now! =) There's also a second event gallery with more images. http://imgur.com/a/JvSdS/layout/horizontal#0
Imgur is a weird little booger sometimes. Oh well  =)
Kalista and Thresh so cool
Thank you! ^.^ I'm happy you liked them!

:D That Minion was me! Yay! I'm in the album!! 

Aahh, wish I got more passes though. :( Didn't have time to turn in my quest or get any of the cool swag. R.I.P. 

At least i got this picture so I'm not TECHNICALLY emptyhanded! :D

Ugh! Riot Jynx! I took pictures with you but they came out crappy =(
I was the Mecha Kha'zix with all my mecha friends lol.
Amumu getting hugs was the best XD
JUST AMAZING! So many of these costumes were on point! My favorite was the Wukong! Minimalistic yet an accurate translation. Love it!!!

So glad there are actually good pictures of me. I'm the graves in the cosplay showcase image on this page with the light up gun, next to my room mate dressed as a giant poro and my girlfriend as star guardian lux.
Great work on all your costumes! They must have been fun to work on! My personal favorite was Arcade Riven. That sword and those headphones are awesome!
holy crap that jinx looks exactly like my ex... So freaking weird..
looks like fun guys! I may not have been there, but those costumes look amazing!
I want to see someone do a Shaco cosplay soon!!{{champion:35}}
